com.ibm.team.repository.client.util
Class ThreadPool

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.team.repository.client.util.ThreadPool

public class ThreadPool
extends java.lang.Object

A pool of threads that cooperate to complete some set of tasks. The number of threads are defined at construction.

Tasks are fed in with repeated calls to #add(com.ibm.team.filesystem.client.internal.ThreadPool.Task). When the calling thread wishes to wait for all of the tasks to complete, it calls ThreadPool.join().

Since:
0.5

Method Detail

taskComplete

protected void taskComplete(ThreadPool.PoolJob job,
                            ThreadPool.Task task,
                            org.eclipse.core.runtime.IStatus status)
Called by a ThreadPool.PoolJob to indicate that it has completed a task. This function allows the ThreadPool to schedule the next job for the ThreadPool.PoolJob, as well has handle the return code of the task.

Parameters:
job - The PoolJob that finished executing a task.
task - The task that was completed.
status - The status that the task returned.

setCancellation

public void setCancellation(org.eclipse.core.runtime.IStatus status)
Force the cancellation status to be set.

addTask

public void addTask(ThreadPool.Task task)
             throws org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
Add a new task to pool's todo list. If there are any sleeping threads, one will be revived to handle the task.

Throws:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException

reschedule

protected void reschedule(ThreadPool.PoolJob job)
Reschedule the passed job (if there are any tasks left).

join

public void join()
          throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Pause the current thread until all of the tasks have finished executing.

Throws:
java.lang.InterruptedException - should the thread be interrupted: note, if the thread is interrupted after the receiver is canceled, a OperationCanceledException will be thrown instead.
org.eclipse.core.runtime.OperationCanceledException

isCanceled

public boolean isCanceled()
Return true if a cancellation has occured.
